main event: A UFO incident occurred near Red Springs, North Carolina on June 23, 1958 involving white-colored lights falling and observed by both a co-pilot and VOR stations.
interesting points: The UFO lights were noticed in three pairs at the points of an imaginary inverted equilateral triangle.
The falling UFO lights resembled a pistol shot, but their distance and size were uncertain.
The incident occurred during a refueling mission between a KB-50 and a B-52.
Other natural phenomena, such as a three-foot arc of static electricity and active aurora borealis, were reported in the area around the same time as the UFO sighting.
The report mentions coordination efforts with various officials regarding the incident.
